title: The Windows Subsystem for Linux is now open source
author: pentagrama
aiHeadline: Microsoft finally opens up WSL, because who doesn't love a good Linux on Windows paradox?

title: Don't guess my language
author: e-topy
aiHeadline: A new tool is tired of guessing your language, because honestly, it's not a game.

title: Zod 4
author: bpierre
aiHeadline: Zod 4 is here, because clearly, the first three weren't enough to confuse you.

title: GitHub Copilot Coding Agent
author: net01
aiHeadline: GitHub Copilot is here to be your coding sidekick, because who doesn't need a robot to write their code for them?

title: Have I Been Pwned 2.0
author: LorenDB
aiHeadline: Have I Been Pwned 2.0 is here to remind you that the internet is a dark, scary place, and your data is probably out there somewhere.
